content: 4 size 6 double pointed needles are used through out i designed this little doll during the covid 19 isolation i decided to share the pattern and to shoot the videos to share with other knitters i thought i might share some knitting joy in this scary time i used scrap yarns so some weights are a little lighter than worsted weight but with the stranded work it thickens up those sections this is for the knitter who has some experience with stranded work because i don t teach that in this pattern my website is down for a short time right now january 25 2022 it will be back up soon
